attributes.action: Reduce Parking penalty charges from £65 to   £35 if paid with in 14 days
attributes.background:
All penalty charges should be reduced to  £35 from £65 because Londoner can’t afford £65 and don’t deserve this.
£65 hurt Londoner and it’s too much as compared to average earning and in inflation.
It’s hard to earn and feed family as every Londoner is hand mouth.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
